summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were higher on Friday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 20
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were higher on Friday, with 15 gaining and the other four declining.
Bitcoin rose 5.3% to $22,216 by market close.
